archimate:Requirement.name: AU-3(3): Content of Audit Records | Limit Personally Identifiable Information Elements
archimate:Requirement.documentation: Limit personally identifiable information contained in audit records to the following elements identified in the privacy risk assessment: [Assignment: organization-defined elements].

properties.value: Limiting personally identifiable information in audit records when such information is not needed for operational purposes helps reduce the level of privacy risk created by a system.
